item.title: 欧洲股市大涨会持续多久？
item.description:
美国市场可能主宰全球，但欧洲股市却经历了有史以来最辉煌的时期之一。在本期万亿节目中，我们将讨论这种情况能否持续。【原文：

The US market may dominate the globe, but European equities have had one of their best runs ever. In this episode of Trillions, we discuss if it can last.

】

item.title: 食品价格飙升，赞比亚通胀率创 39 个月新高
item.description: 由于受到一个多世纪以来最严重干旱的影响，以及克瓦查的急剧贬值继续推高肉类和谷物成本，赞比亚的年通货膨胀率在二月份加速上升，创下三年多来的新高。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation accelerated to a more than three-year high in February as the impact of its worst drought in more than a century and a steep depreciation in the kwacha continued to push up meat and grain costs.】

item.title: 英国碳捕集投资因规则不确定而受阻
item.description: Drax Group Plc 呼吁在其英格兰北部的生物质发电厂加强碳污染控制投资之前，要有更多的监管确定性。【原文：Drax Group Plc called for more regulatory certainty before it steps up investments in carbon pollution controls at its biomass plant in northern England.】

item.title: 西班牙通胀因基数效应和强劲经济而持续走高
item.description: 在能源基数效应和经济繁荣的推动下，西班牙 2 月份的通胀率依然居高不下。【原文：Spanish inflation remained elevated in February, driven by energy base effects and a booming economy.】

item.title: 2024 年底瑞士经济增长 0.5%，高于首次预期
item.description: 得益于制造业的复苏，瑞士经济以近两年来最快的速度增长。【原文：Switzerland’s economy grew at the fastest pace in almost two years thanks to a recovery in manufacturing.】

item.title: 南非寻求与美国在紧张关系中达成 "有意义的协议
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）表示，在两国关系紧张的情况下，南非希望与美国就外交和贸易问题达成广泛协议。【原文：South Africa wants to reach a broad-ranging agreement with the US on diplomacy and trade amid strained ties between the two nations, President Cyril Ramaphosa said.】

item.title: 普京特使瞄准特朗普和马斯克，引诱美国达成乌克兰协议
item.description: 基里尔-德米特里耶夫（Kirill Dmitriev）本周在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的X平台上撰文，宣布美俄合作是 "应对世界挑战的关键"。随后，他发布了一段视频，描绘了美国和沙特阿拉伯搭乘马斯克的 SpaceX 火箭联合执行火星任务的情景。【原文：Kirill Dmitriev wrote on Elon Musk’s X platform for the first time since 2012 this week to declare US-Russia cooperation was “key to address world challenges.” Then he posted a video graphic depicting a joint mission to Mars with the US and Saudi Arabia on what appears to be one of Musk’s SpaceX rockets.】

item.title: 开发商泰勒温培预计今年英国房屋销售量将上升
item.description: 英国最大的开发商之一预计将在 2025 年售出更多住宅，这为经历了两年艰难时期的房屋建筑商提供了一些安慰。【原文：One of Britain’s biggest developers expects to sell more homes in 2025, offering some relief after a grueling two-years for housebuilders.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行任命凯勒为瑞士公司业务主管
item.description: 法国巴黎银行已任命 Michael Keller 为瑞士企业业务负责人。【原文：BNP Paribas has appointed Michael Keller as head of its Swiss corporate coverage.】

item.title: Aviva 盈利超出预期，Direct Line 交易 "步入正轨
item.description: Aviva Plc 公布的全年利润超出预期，因为该公司继续想方设法让现有客户购买更多产品。【原文：Aviva Plc reported full-year profit that topped expectations as it continued to find ways to get more of its products into the hands of existing customers.】

item.title: 恒大清盘人寻求法院指导以简化清盘程序
item.description: 全球负债最多的建筑商中国恒大集团的清算人正在寻求香港法院的指导，以确定债券持有人是否可以加入一个委员会，从而简化公司的清盘程序。【原文：Liquidators of China Evergrande Group, the world’s most indebted builder, are seeking guidance from a Hong Kong court on whether bondholders can be part of a committee that would streamline the company’s winding-up process.】

item.title: 日本邮政计划出售价值 42 亿美元的银行部门股权
item.description: 日本邮政控股公司计划出售日本邮政银行股份有限公司（Japan Post Bank Co.【原文：Japan Post Holdings Co. plans to sell a stake in Japan Post Bank Co. that could raise ¥630 billion ($4.2 billion), the latest disposal in the former state-run giant’s decade-long privatization efforts.】

item.title: 西班牙看到欧盟成员国团结在共同防御基金周围
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）表示，欧盟各国可能会团结在共同国防开支的周围，因为该地区正在寻找加强安全的方法。【原文：European Union nations are likely to rally around common defense spending, as the region looks at ways to bolster its security, according to Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo.】

item.title: WPP 称今年销售额可能萎缩，低于预期
item.description: WPP Plc 预测今年的销售额将持平或缩水，低于分析师的预期，此前该广告公司称第四季度客户支出减少。【原文：WPP Plc forecast sales that would remain flat or shrink this year, missing analysts’ estimates, after the advertising agency said it saw weaker client spending in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 威立雅预计 2025 年利润将超过去年创纪录的需求量
item.description: 威立雅环境集团（Veolia Environnement SA）在水、废物处理和能源需求激增的情况下，实现了有史以来盈利最多的一年，预计 2025 年盈利将进一步增长。【原文：Veolia Environnement SA sees further growth in earnings in 2025 after surging demand for water, waste treatment and energy resulted in its most profitable year ever.】

item.title: 油价走低，炼油利润下降，埃尼公司利润下滑
item.description: 由于油价下跌和炼油利润下降，埃尼公司第四季度利润下降，该公司宣布在东南亚成立一家新的合资企业。【原文：Eni SpA’s profit fell in the fourth quarter due to lower oil prices and weaker refining margins, and it announced a new joint venture in southeast Asia.】

item.title: StanChart 被选为印度金融中心的美元结算银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）已被选为该国唯一的全球金融中心所有美元交易实时结算的银行，可能将于 6 月底进行实时结算。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc has been picked as the bank for real-time settlement of all dollar-denominated trades in the country’s only global financial center, likely slated for end-June, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：财报蜂拥而至，英国股市将下挫
乌克兰将与特朗普签署矿产协议：详情如下
item.description: 沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）周五将前往华盛顿签署一项协议，使美国未来能够从这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的自然资源中获取收益。【原文：Volodymyr Zelenskiy is heading to Washington Friday to sign a deal that will allow the US to tap into future revenue from the war-battered country’s natural resources.】

item.title: 印度股指连续数日与波动率指数同步波动，模式不同寻常
item.description: 印度基准股票指数和波动指数连续七天同步波动，这种情况十分罕见。在一些市场观察家看来，这表明交易商对大盘股进一步下跌的担忧有所减少。【原文：In a rare occurrence, India’s benchmark stock gauge and its volatility index have moved in tandem for seven straight days. To some market watchers, that signals traders are less concerned about further declines in large-cap shares.】

item.title: 希尔豪斯聘请百事可乐亚太区首席执行官扩大消费者投资
item.description: 资产管理公司希尔豪斯投资（Hillhouse Investment）聘请了百事公司亚太区首席执行官陈文渊（Wern-Yuen Tan），以扩大在该地区的消费者投资。【原文：Asset manager Hillhouse Investment has hired PepsiCo Inc.’s Asia-Pacific Chief Executive Officer Wern-Yuen Tan in a push to expand consumer investments in the region.】

item.title: 西班牙市场好转，西班牙电信公司业绩符合预期
item.description: 西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）报告的利润符合预期，因为该公司在西班牙这个电信市场的业务有所改善。【原文：Telefonica SA reported profit that was in line with estimates as its business in Spain, the telecommunications company’s home market, improved.】

item.title: 野村因人工智能行业审查和关税问题减持台股
item.description: 野村控股公司下调了台湾股票的评级，理由是人工智能行业受到更严格的审查，以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对贸易伙伴征收关税。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. downgraded Taiwanese equities citing greater scrutiny of the artificial intelligence sector and US President Donald Trump’s plans to impose tariffs on trading partners.】

item.title: 收益超预期，安盛计划最高回购 12 亿欧元
item.description: Axa SA 计划今年回购多达 12 亿欧元的股票，并将股息提高 9%，以回馈股东，此前这家法国保险公司公布的财报显示，在财产保险和人寿保险业务增长的推动下，盈利好于预期。【原文：Axa SA plans to repurchase as much as €1.2 billion of stock this year and raise its dividend by 9%, rewarding shareholders after the French insurer reported better-than-expected earnings fueled by growth in its property and life insurance businesses.】

item.title: 让他们无法拒绝的马阿拉歌协议
item.description:
特朗普有说服手段来达成广泛的美元协议 —，但与真正重要的国家除外。【原文：

Trump has the means of persuasion to get a broad dollar agreement — except with the country that really matters. 

】

item.title: 据说紫光集团将向银行申请 10 亿美元在香港上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国IT服务公司紫光集团（Unisplendour Corp）已选定法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）、招商银行国际（China Merants Bank International）和中证金融有限公司（CSC Financial Co.【原文：Chinese IT services company Unisplendour Corp. has picked BNP Paribas SA, China Merchants Bank International and CSC Financial Co. for its planned second listing in Hong Kong, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 当央行使用 Instagram 时，请注意 "崩溃 "一词
item.description:
货币政策的主宰者们正在转向社交媒体来接触年轻选民。【原文：

The masters of monetary policy are turning to social media to reach young constituents. 

】

item.title: 日本出生人数创历史最低纪录，人口危机加剧
item.description: 日本的出生人数再创历史新低，这凸显了一个日益严峻的挑战，即如何用已经越来越少的纳税工人来承担老龄化社会不断膨胀的社会保障成本。【原文：The number of births in Japan fell to another record low, underscoring the growing challenge of how to shoulder ballooning social security costs for an aging society with what’s already become an ever shrinking pool of tax-paying workers.】
